tool_description: Creates personalized daily, weekly, and monthly hair care routines based on hair type, conditions, goals, and lifestyle constraints.

hair_type_code.description: Hair type from Hair Type Classifier

available_time_minutes.description: Daily hair care time available in minutes (5-120)

wash_frequency_preference.description: Preferred washing schedule: daily, every_other_day, twice_weekly, weekly

error_messages: Invalid hair type code: Must be valid code from Hair Type Classifier
Empty concerns list: At least one primary concern must be provided
Invalid time allocation: available_time_minutes must be between 5 and 120
Invalid wash frequency: Must be one of [daily, every_other_day, twice_weekly, weekly]
Invalid budget level: Must be one of [budget, mid_range, premium]
Too many concerns: Maximum 5 primary concerns allowed
usage: Provide hair type code, primary concerns, available time, wash frequency preference, and budget level. Optionally specify styling preferences. Returns comprehensive routine with product recommendations and scheduling.

adjustment_timeline.description: When to expect results and make changes
